long_description: This comprehensive guide has everything you need to plan a day hike, a weekend tour or a weeks-long vacation between Bend and Hells Canyon. Author: William L. Sullivan. Softcover; 256 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Navillus Press; copyright 2008. Each hike includes a difficulty rating, distance, elevation gain, map and detailed information to help you get the most out of the area. Also includes information on lodging, museums and other sightseeing destinations in the area.
short_description: This comprehensive guide has everything you need to plan a day hike, a weekend tour or a weeks-long vacation between Bend and Hells Canyon.
